npcSpeech.text: Have you not heard of me? Pratchett the DRAGOOOOOOON? What...? Nothing. Hmmm... regardless. I've been called here by a friend from far away. There's a change coming and help is needed. Hmmm... I do not yet know where you stand... if you are on the right side I will let you through... now how can I test you. Aha... ROOOAAR!!!! PUSH!!!! PPHHEWWWWW!!!!!
It seems you are worthy in mind and spirit. You may pass.
I was summoned by an old friend. He said he saw a need for me.
